welcome.title: Welcome to Movingwise
welcome.subtitle: Organize, plan and control every step of your move from one place.
welcome.joinSubtitle: Start your journey with us and make moving simple and efficient.

forgot.title: Reset Password

validation.passwordNeedLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter

operations.title: Full Operations Control
operations.description: Manage your team, routes, and tasks from a single app.

financial.title: Clear Financial Control
financial.description: Record payments, manage payroll, and get automatic reports on income, expenses, and profits.

team.title: Always Organized Team
team.description: Each worker has their own account to register shifts, check-ins, and check-outs, ensuring traceability and order.

hero.heading: Smart logistic management for your moving company
hero.subheading: With MovingWise, organize your trucks, personnel, and transfers in one place. In real time, without confusion.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: The all-in-one tool for your moving company to work without chaos or confusion.

staff.title: Easy Staff Assignment
staff.description: Assign staff and coordinate every move without complications.

reports.title: Reports & Total Control
reports.description: Generate clear reports of income, expenses and profits.

realtime.title: Real-time Visibility
realtime.description: Moving status and worker check-in/out tracking.

plans.title: Plans & Subscriptions
plans.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs

contact.title: Start your logistics today
contact.subtitle: Leave us your details and an advisor will help you implement Moving Wise in your company.

footer.description: At Moving Wise, we believe that an organized operation is the foundation for growth. We designed this tool with detail and commitment so that every move is managed without chaos, with clarity and real results.

applyToOrders.warningAlert: Some orders failed to update. Check details below.
applyToOrders.skippedAlert: All orders were skipped because they already have values.
applyToOrders.matchingOrders: This statement record has {{count}} matching order(s). Choose how to apply the amounts.
applyToOrders.warningValuesCaption: Choose your action carefully to avoid overwriting existing data.
applyToOrders.autoDesc: Only updates orders with income/expense at 0 or NULL. Safe option that won't overwrite existing data.
applyToOrders.overwriteDesc: Replaces all order amounts with distributed values from the statement. Use when you trust the statement over existing orders.
applyToOrders.addDesc: Adds distributed statement amounts to existing order values. Use when you want to combine both sources.
applyToOrders.distributionNote: Distribution: Amounts will be divided equally among all {{count}} order(s). Each order will receive ${{income}} income and ${{expense}} expense.

bulkUpdate.subtitle: Update states for selected statement records
bulkUpdate.warningAlert: Some records failed to update. Check details below.
bulkUpdate.errorAlert: All updates failed. Check details below.
bulkUpdate.readyTitle: Ready to Update Statement Record States
bulkUpdate.readyDesc: This operation will only update the state field of the selected statement records and the income and expense amount.
bulkUpdate.readyNote: To update order amounts, use the "Apply to Orders" option after verification.
bulkUpdate.footerNote: Note: You can verify the changes after updating by refreshing the statements table.
